attributes.action: We demand sir alex Ferguson steps up once more and saves Manchester united
attributes.additional_details: As a manchester united fan, i feel Manchester united doesn't seem the same anymore and the only way to reunite the fans with the team and for Manchester united to start winning again is for fergie to step up and save us. COME BACK FERGIE MANCHESTER UNITED TEAM NEEDS YOU !!!! GGMU
attributes.background: Sir alex ferguson needs to stop watching his team in the crowd, come out of of retirement and reunite Manchester united once again
